Posts.Content: Thanks, Semh,  That is very helpful.  Have just found your message in my ‘junk’ emails!  Will have to see if I can change that!  The side effects of the TCHP were disabling first round, but her oncologist suggested lowering the doses of the T and C, plus less steroids, and it has been slightly better this time.  Daughter has an ultrasound appointment today so here’s hoping for shrinkage!  Best Wishes for your surgery.
